name: evonest
description: Autonomous code evolution engine — observe, plan, execute, verify
author: Evonest Contributors

commands.name: analyze
commands.description: Scan the project and save all improvement opportunities as proposals (no code changes)

commands.name: evolve
commands.description: Full evolution cycle: Observe → Plan → Execute → Verify → commit/PR

commands.name: improve
commands.description: Pick a proposal and execute it (no Observe/Plan phases)

commands.name: identity
commands.description: Refresh evonest identity.md — re-read the project and propose an updated identity document
